#### My name is <span class="highlight-blue">**Andrew M. Demetriou**</span>, and I work on Trustworthy and Responsible Artificial Intelligence. 



I aim to bring more thought to how we measure the performance of AI systems, by integrating knowledge from the social sciences, and the science of measurement to 'ground-truthing' - the process of designing, gathering, and evaluating the data we use to measure the performance of AI systems.
